is_faq.description: This will add Structured Data Markup to the accordeon.

wide.description: Text container (only for full width containers)

overflow_hidden.description: This will hide items outside the container.

drag_free.description: Enables momentum scrolling. The duration of the continued scrolling is proportional to how vigorous the drag gesture is.

arrows_overlay.description: This will place the arrows on top of the carousel.

auto_scroll_speed.description: Number of pixels auto scroll should advance per frame.

type.description: Select content type of the carousel

thank_you.default_value: Thank you for your message.We will get back to you within 48 hours.

destination.description: Can be an email or Slack channel id

contact_form.description: Default contact form. Opened by a link to #contact

newsletter_in_footer.description: Make sure you have set up the newsletter settings in your .env

tiny_analytics_id.description: Simple and privacy-friendly,‍ website analytics. Free for one site! https://tinyanalytics.io/

crop.description: If not selected, image will be placed in the aspect ratio without cropping.

video.description:
⚠️⚠️⚠️Keep the video files under 1MB!⚠️⚠️⚠️
not sure? ask your "art department" for help.
